EmailTemplate.name: SGN_Chivas_Brotocal.Email - Thank you
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}}, Thanks for Being a Bro!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Bro! Thank you for being a part of last weekend's happenings! We hope you had a blast.
Check out the Chivas Singapore Facebook page <[[https://www.facebook.com/chivassingapore]]> for photos of what went down that night and like the page for updates on Chivas Brotocol.
See you at the next one!
This is an automatically generated email, please do not reply.
